LanguageData.RK_LetterShattering: {0} is disintegrating. Very soon they will explode in a cloud of active originium dust, potentially spreading infection. \nKeep others away from {0}'s corpse!
LanguageData.RK_LetterOripathicDeath: {0} was oripathic and their corpse will eventually explode in a cloud of originium dust. \nConsider incinerating the corpse or keep it away from people.
